name: bintools
title: BinTools
description: Convertor: hex, binary, decimal, strings, etc.
author: quentin_cormand

commands.name: index
commands.title: Bin Tools
commands.subtitle: Binary Tools.
commands.description: Convert decimal to hex, bin and count number of bits required to make this number.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
